trans-unit.source: An inline-level flow content element which causes content to render with a bold font weight.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold> enforces a strong content model for child content.
See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold> content model.
The object is the equivalent of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span> with <xref:System.Windows.FontWeight> set to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Bold%2A>.
Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref>, and a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> specifying an insertion position for the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> element.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref>.
This parameter may be `null`, in which case no <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> is inserted.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> specifying an insertion position at which to insert the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref> element after it is created, or `null` for no automatic insertion.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref> class, taking two <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> objects that indicate the beginning and end of a selection of content to be contained by the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref>.
This constructor is intended to initialize a new <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold> element such that it encloses a selection of pre-existing content.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> indicating the beginning of a selection of content to be contained by the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> indicating the end of a selection of content to be contained by the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Bold"></xref>.
Raised when start and end do not resolve to a range of content suitable for enclosure by a element, for example, if start and end indicate positions in different paragraphs.
